website_summaries.verdict: A mid-priced model with several nice safety and comfort features and some functional issues that may lead to consumer frustration.
pros: Air Protect cushioning protects rear-facing and front-facing passengers
Thick seat padding and cup holder
cons: Reports of of the unit being challenging to install and the straps difficult to adjust
Some parents gripe about the plastic components feeling "cheap

customer_reviews.title: I was in a very bad accident two weeks ago with my three year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I was in a very bad accident two weeks ago with my three year old son. I got rear ended by a tractor trailer going 70 miles per hour. Thank God my son and I are pretty much ok. This car seat was fabulous. The air bags deployed and saved my son's life!!!!! Thank you, Maxi Cosi!!!! I would recommend this to any parent looking for a safe and reliable car seat. A little pricey, but it's worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: BEST carseat ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST carseat ever. I Will never use any other brand. My son has been in 2 car accidents unfortunately and he has never had 1 sign of any injury. This seat has kept him 100% safe.
customer_reviews.author: ajennings@tds.net

customer_reviews.title: I’m so disappointed that I have had this seat since feb 26 ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed that I have had this seat since feb 26 2018 and a hole has already worn into the front of seat pad. I love it other wise, but the material is obviously cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany crissinger

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use!
customer_reviews.text: I would hands down put 5 stars if I didn’t struggle so much with unclipping the straps. I love the security but with the magnetic clasp it makes it very difficult to get my son out from time-to-time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks so plush
customer_reviews.text: My son is so much more comfortable in this convertible car seat vs the evenflo I bought first. He evenflo does not recline enough! We loved the maxi Cosi infant car seat and now we love this one! He looks so comfy and his head does not flop forward when he sleeps like it did in the evenflo! The only negative is that snack at the top is tricky at first and it seems uncomfortable on the chest (my son rips the cushions off daily).
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Because 93%
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat because after my infant seat, I only wanted to buy one more car seat. The 85 lb weight limit was the only one I felt confident my son wouldn’t out grow. I really like the design and I feel like my son is very safe in this car seat. He has a lot of room to grow and seems comfortable. A huge selling point for me was the removable and washable cover. I’m trying to use this car seat for the long haul and you just never know what will get on it. My husband didn’t have any complaints about installation.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Soojian

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pull straps tight!
customer_reviews.text: Seat was beautiful and had all the safety features possible on paper. The problem was simple use. It was physically impossible for me to pull the straps tight enough. It feels like this company thought of everything and then last minute designed the tightening system. I am returning seat, struggling to get the seat tight enough is a huge safety issue. All it takes is one rushed struggle and the seat will be ineffective during a crash. I will be spending the money on a Nuna.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Love our seat
customer_reviews.text: Love our seat. Bought for our baby, but the toddler wanted it lol so we let her sit in it and rear faced the other carseat. My only issue, which other have noted, is the straps get twisted up. They get twisted in front of my toddler when I try to latch her, and they were a mess under the carseat cover when I set it up. Had to untangle and reorganize them and no longer have issues underneath, but have daily issues with the straps twisting in front of our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M. Inkrott

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Maxi Cosi has me as a customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a little over one month now. I am a first time mom and my baby is 6 months now. For her infant carrier, we went cheap. It didn't take us long to realize that we needed a serious upgrade. The Pria 85 is so luxurious. So comfortable. A dream to clean. Easy install (read instructions thoroughly) and very easy to tighten the straps, despite what other reviews say. I have no doubt that my baby girl is safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherR

customer_reviews.title: Constantly reinstalling because harness won’t tighten
customer_reviews.text: We’ve constantly had issues with this car seat. The harness strap won’t consistently tighten, so we’ve had to reinstall it countless times-which is a huge hassle. It has its positives, like a plush seat, nice little amenities, looks great, but I ultimately don’t feel like this is a safe car seat
customer_reviews.author: jennec

customer_reviews.title: Worth the installation struggles - it's safe and crazy comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of reviews say it's next to impossible to get in the car tightly...True story. My husband has the biggest muscles (like ever) and even he struggles to get it locked into place. Our beastie is almost 4 and tall but it fits her well. The seat is insanely well made, great safety reviews and she sleeps in it well without her head flopping over. I obsessively hunted for weeks trying to find the perfect one, this is pretty great... put it in your cart
customer_reviews.author: Oink

customer_reviews.title: Straps randomly detached
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps randomly detached as I was buckling my daughter. No clue why as I have never messed with the straps. Did my best to reattach so I could hopefully figure it out with Maci Cosi customer service & made sure it was tightly attached. It detached a second time. Not sure if I have a defective seat, but I am 0% comfortable driving my daughter in this car seat. Also, this car seat was miserable to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We picked this seat because we prefer a higher end line for baby items and liked how plush it was. I borrowed a new Graco Extend2Fit for a trip (plane + rental car) from a friend and felt like it just wasn't that great. When it was time to move our baby up from his UppaBaby infant seat we went with this. So far he seems to like it a lot and we love how easy it is to get him in/out. I did find install to be a bit more difficult and take a lot of pressure to get it a tight fit on the seat of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This is the car seat you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat of all time. Don’t get a different one. Get this one. This is the second one we’ve bought for our second child. It’s WASHING MACHINE and DRYER SAFE!!! You can keep it brand new clean all the time which is amazing. It’s SUPER comfortable and breathable. We live in Arizona and haven’t ever had a problem with it getting too hot in the summer. Seriously, BUY THIS CARSEAT. It also has a longer expiration that many on the market. So it’s a bit more expensive, but you will get SO MUCH use out of it because you can keep it clean so it will truly last the whole time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellybroms

customer_reviews.title: Plush padding, hooks for straps, easy click chest strap!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had three different makes of car seats for our kids and I believe this one is the best. The different style chest clip is incredibly simple to ‘snap’ together. The straps pull out really smoothly unlike other car seats (Graco) and they can even hook at these tiny little plastic hooks on each side of the car seat so you don’t have to pull them out from your baby when you set them in it. The padding throughout the car seat is very soft and surrounds our baby very well. Our little guy is growing out of this car seat fast but it truly was a great buy for when he was little.
customer_reviews.author: Ned man

customer_reviews.title: Seat cover not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is very good with all the adjustability, however the seat cover is not very good. I've washed the cover a total of 3 times following the exact instructions in the manual and the stitching is coming completely apart. Since this is supposed to last up to 85 pounds I would expect it to hold up to more than a few washings. Additionally, the covers themselves are almost $100 so this has been a pretty disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ice

customer_reviews.title: Unsolicited arm workout
customer_reviews.text: The straps are super difficult to tighten to a safe place when securing baby in the seat. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tighten straps, very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this car seat for about 6 months now and I’m about to get rid of it purely because the straps are so hard to tighten. My husband has the chicco and it’s exponentially easier to get them right.
customer_reviews.author: dvdalkd

customer_reviews.title: Good seat that can be used up to 85 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fabric where the child sits is soft, buckles are easy to adjust if they get twisted, cover is removable and washable, can be used up to 85 pounds, magnetic clip can be opened one handed. Cons: this seat is huge and takes up a lot of space. I have 2 of them (one forward facing and one rear facing) and they take up most of the back seat in a standard / full size SUV.
customer_reviews.author: SaraMcc

customer_reviews.title: Safety critical hardware!
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough purchase to decide on but we have been very happy with this seat. We bought one in black and one in tan for both vehicles. The safety features are plentiful and the seat itself is quite handsome. The padding is great and the features for getting our little one into the seat are really convenient. Everything can be washed readily and there is a ton of adjustability in the design.
customer_reviews.author: hw_engineerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat !
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. We have the exact same one in black for our 3 year old and purchased this one for the new baby. Easy to install, easy to clean, LOVE the magnetic top Buckle. Very comfortable, the head rest part really is useful as they get older. We have an extra car seat for my mom that’s another brand without it and I notice a big difference when our toddler falls asleep with the head moving. We are not “car eaters” so I can’t speak for stains but it really is a breeze to wash at home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RocioRG12

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought the Britax...
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk by buying this car seat over the Britax Marathon... I made the WRONG choice. The clips feel cheap and flimsy. The worst part about this seat is the unbelievably difficult strap to loosen and tighten.. It makes for a very annoying process EVERY time I put my little one in and get her out of the seat. I've been dealing with it for over a year now, in rear-facing and forward-facing positions, and I've had it. I'm buying the Britax and never looking back. On a positive note, it's a cozy seat with an easily washable cover. But the positives just do not outweigh the difficulty I have with the everyday function of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!! And its so cute too!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to put this car seat in the car. It is so cute and my baby looks so comfortable in it. I'm so happy I purchased it. One thing though I wouldn't recommend if you have a small car. I usually have it in a van and its comfortable in there but we put it in a new wrx and it was a little large for it we had to have the front passenger seat all the way forward when the car sat was rear facing. I'd imagine itd ve more comfortable when shes forward facing but rear facing was a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Cdizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: This seat was very easy to install and fits our 7 month old nicely. He outgrew his infant car seat (also a Maxi-Cosi) so we knew that we wanted to stay within the brand. My son looks very comfortable in this seat; the body pillow is a nice touch. And don’t get me started on the magnetic clip...it’s worth the extra money! I also love the details on the seat- such as the strap holders for when the baby is not in the seat. I’m looking forward to seeing how it holds up as he gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: TDo

customer_reviews.title: She looks more comfortable than ever
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I've put my 1-year-old daughter in this seat, all the crying stopped. She looks more comfortable than ever! two concerns I have is the straps get all wounded up if only the straps were more solid so they wouldn't get wound up as much would be an absolute plus. Also, the buckle release is difficult to press and release. The buckle itself is extremely durable and secure, which is very noticeable. Besides that, when you install this car seat you know you're giving your child the most secure and comfort care seat on the market! The price of the car seat was a small price to pay for the safety of my child!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Murad

customer_reviews.title: Safe for baby, dangerous for parents
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m happy with how comfy my daughter is and all the safety features. And the magnetic buckle is handy. With that said, my husband really cut up his hands trying to adjust the latch beneath the seat and we bought two and it happened on both of them. If you require installers to adjust things beneath the seat Maxi Cosi should really make sure there aren’t sharp edges in areas where you need to put your hands. For a little extra money, they should ensure the mold has rounded edges during production.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hansell

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat I have found! I shopped around for months for a convertible car seat that was both comfortable and safe for my son. I initially hesitated because of the price tag, but I can say this car seat has been worth every penny. My son would scream every second in the car until we got this seat. Now he rarely cries while in the car. As for past reviews, I was worried that the straps would be easily tangled, but that hasn’t been the case for us. Overall, I would highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Our 17 month old grandson was untouched while strapped in ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 month old grandson was untouched while strapped in this carseat during an accident in August. Not a scratch on him! We replaced and he now rides safely.
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Sara Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 months old daughter fall asleep in this carseat easily. Looks very comfy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: My 5 months old daughter fall asleep in this carseat easily. Looks very comfy and high quality. The removable body pillow adds extra comfort to my baby. It takes some practice to open the magnetic chest clip. The strap do get tangled easily too. The seat belt (red button) is very difficult to press open but I don't mind as long as my daughter is comfy in the seat. The cup holder was also very useful. The fabric is breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Mina C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sweet/difficult buckle
customer_reviews.text: So this seat seems comfortable and it was relatively easy to install. Only reason this is not a 5 star review is because the buckle is hard to use and baby is super impatient while I try to figure it out, every single time. We need a second car seat for a second vehicle and I will be getting a different seat just because this doesn’t seem to live up to all the hype, but I still think it will work and be safe and so dont regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: Annamal24

customer_reviews.title: Great car seats.
customer_reviews.text: Maxi cosi are the only convertible car seats we purchase for my vehicle. They are kinda bulky so more then 2 may not fit in a compact car very well with anyone else being in the back seat but this is a good car seat. The only con is when rear facing it’s hard to tighten the straps so you have to pull the straps in the back tight then pull the tightening strap tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cassbuz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We are obsessed with this carseat!! It was exactly what I was wanting!! The first week we got it we went on a 7 hour road trip and my son did AMAZING!! I love that it's easy to wash. I have a chevy Cruze and I wanted something that wasn't too big but it fits great! My husband it 6'4" and he still has plenty of leg room! If you are trying to decide on what carseat to get, stop searching and buy this one! It is also super easy to install!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a BAD item but it’s far from great. I have a nuna so I was spoiled. This one is a little longer to install and the buckles are not as smooth and easy to clip in. Again not horrible or anything just not great.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy car seat
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter seems so much more content in her seat now. She falls asleep much quicker and is not fussy anymore when we put her in the car. My grandson is 2 years old. His parents bought this seat for him when he was about 8 months old, and the same thing happened with him. He was fussy when placed in his infant seat, and that stopped when they got this seat for him, so I bought one for my 7 month old granddaughter. It was like going from a bar stool to a recliner.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Best car seats
customer_reviews.text: We Bought this car seat when my first boy was 8 months old and he’s now 4 years old and still fits comfortably in it. We recently bought another one for our now 8 month old son. We love our Maxi Cosi products!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Affordable luxury car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value for the 85 pria max I could find. Seat is large, well cushioned, well ventilated and high quality. The improved chest clip feels sharp against baby’s body. And seat is so large, it has to go on the side in a sedan, not the middle. And the seat in front of it needs completely moved forward. And it’s still a tight squeeze in my Jetta.
customer_reviews.author: Christa B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this seat for our six month old son after he rapidly outgrew his infant car seat. Have the Pria 85 for our two year old daughter, now the Pria 85 Max for our son! Absolutely love it. Esthetically pleasing, unlike many car seats. Premium fabric. High quality construction. I don’t feel like I’m compromising in any area with these seats when it comes to my children’s safety. And you can’t put a price on peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our AZ summers!
customer_reviews.text: I researched so many car seats before I got this one and I'm so glad I decided on this one! My son is always hot and when it gets up to 120 here in the summer I didn't want him to overheat. The material is soft and comfortable, he never complains about being too hot it in. It is easy to take the cover off and wash it, and easy to install. I will be buying another one for our daughter, and I recommend it to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We've made our way through a few different brands & styles of car seat and this is by far the best one. Seems extremely comfortable and the pad comes off in a couple of large pieces so cleaning is a breeze. The strap holders are a life-saver! The only complaint I have is that it's rather large and cumbersome to install (especially if you're in a smaller car). But other than that I definitely recommend this to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Also my son gets carsick very often and this carseat is easy to take apart and wash
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 carseats. One for travel and one for every day use. This is our everyday use carseat. It is sturdier than most and I feel much safer than anything else on the market. It is a bit heavy and awkward however for travel (planes). Also my son gets carsick very often and this carseat is easy to take apart and wash. After over 20 washes the material is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great convertible car seat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this convertible car seat to replace my daughters Chicco KeyFit 30 which she is quickly outgrowing. This carseat fits in the back seat of my BMW 328i comfortably but may be a tight fit for taller people. I have no issues getting my daughter in and out of the car seat. She also seems to like it and the soft fabric. The buckel is tough to tighten at first but gets a little easier the more you use it so I really don't mind. I was recently rear ended and my daughter was safe and unharmed in this carseat. I am ordering this exact one again. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my granddaughter loves it! She is so comfortable in it and does not fuse when getting in or out. So many support features for her head and neck unlike other brands. My daughter researched this seat before we purchased and is very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Happy Momma
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install this in my mini countryman. I was really nervous about the step up in chair. My little one is still rear facing but he outgrew his infant seat. I love this seat. He's comfortable on long drives and ablr to sleep without his head bobbing.
customer_reviews.author: azure

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this seat!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this car seat for a few months and I have to say it’s great. Very comfy. I read a ton of reviews and the big one was installation. I made adjustments with my son in it before installing. I pushed it down while my husband tightened the straps in the SUV. Wasn’t hard at all although I haven’t tried forward facing yet. We haven’t had to clean it yet. May update in a few more months when it’s around 120 outside 🥵 and see how it does during summer.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best car seat I’ve ever owned and I have four children. It can even recline to hold their head it’s super comfortable we can’t fill any of the underneath plastic it’s like a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to get rid of it
customer_reviews.text: We tried fitting this into the car and it was not a tight fit. We even got some professionals to help out and even they could not figure out why it is not snug. Needless to say, we were not conformable with our child sitting in it. It was a wasteful expenditure since we missed the return deadline and cant even return it. It is lying in the garage catching dust.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews, I purchased this seat for my 16 month old and he loves it. The magnetic clip closure is a breeze for me to unhook. The strap holders make a huge difference. The seat looks really comfortable, he seems much happier traveling in the car. I bought the canopy as well, very happy with that purchase to keep the sun out of his eyes. A little challenging to install but I’d imagine they are all challenging. Esthetically nice to have something that looks like the interior of my car and most importantly, safe. Planning to purchase the same one for my husband’s vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: nglenn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & good for tall kids
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design, very comfortable, my baby falls asleep during car rides very quickly! Love it so much, i bought 2 (1 in my car & 1 in daddy’s) ! I chose this modle bc my child is in the 100th percentile for height, so i needed a carseat that he wouldn’t outgrow too fast
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn Do

customer_reviews.title: Very recommend! Love this seat!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the absolute best rear/forward facing car seat we have tried. I hadn't heard much about this brand but I did my research and found it to be very well liked. It's got cushioning and it keeps my sweaty baby cool. The cup holder is great and it's very easy to clean. I am in love with this seat. My son loves it more. It feels safe and study with the rear facing latch system un or 08 jeep liberty. I can't complain. Easy installation, east to move if needed.
customer_reviews.author: GrayGoose

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, but they should make a video on how to tighten the seat belt straps
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat, the only downside is that I can’t figure out how to tighten the straps. My toddler loves this seat but it’s a little loose for him and I feel like it’s not secure but he falls asleep in it very easily and it’s looks comfy. He constantly rips off the Velcro straps and tosses them and I have to find them in the car. But I really like the magnetic clips making it easy to get him in & out fast.
customer_reviews.author: McC

customer_reviews.title: Love the side impact things for the head.
customer_reviews.text: They're plush and seem comfy for our 11mo twins. I would give 5 stars if it were more stable in our Honda Odyssey. There's enough room in between the car seats for our 13yo daughter to ride and keep an eye on her little sisters. Update: I can't seem to get the seats snug using the vehicle's safety belt. Hopefully it will work better in forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it doesn't have one of those circle readers that lets you know if it's level position- instead a line that says make sure it level. Which I guess is just as easy, but would rater have a sure thing than second guess myself. Love the magnetic clip, makes life super easy. Will be buying for next baby for sure!
customer_reviews.author: chance

customer_reviews.title: 15 month old approved! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: For any child who hates being in a car seat! I already had two car seats including the forever graco but I was getting ready to take a dreaded road trip and thought I would try this one out. He loved it, he sits up higher so he can see out and it looks incredibly comfortable, he slept so well in it! I think it’s worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Renzi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Although this carseat is a little on the bulky side we absolutely love it. It has plenty of cushion and is super east to install. I see other reviews mention difficulty tightening the straps but we have never had any difficulty. It's a heavy carseat however we took it on a round trip flight to orlando and fits perfectly on the airplane seat. My favorite this about it is #1 the padding is super easy to remove and put back on. You can toss right in the washer. #2 the material makes it impossible for the carseat to stain
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Useless straps.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Straps are USELESS. Seeing if a cheap Graco is better. Super annoying because I like the look of this car seat and it seems comfortable. We could never tighten the straps - UNSAFE.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: The latch system is great and ensures that the seat can be installed safely
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Maxi Cosi car seat we bought for our children. The car seat fits perfectly in our Honda Odyssey. The latch system is great and ensures that the seat can be installed safely. Car seat is easy to clean and has a sleek design. The Pria 85 gives great head support and our child's head rests comfortably even when asleep in the car. I consider this car seat safe and would never purchase another brand. The car seat is quiet large, so probably not optimal for smaller vehicle, but I would check with a car seat tech before purchasing any car seat.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Love Maxi-Cosi
customer_reviews.text: We have had Maxi-Cosi car seats for both of our children, from infancy to toddler. We recently upgraded our youngest to this seat, which is the same seat our oldest had and as usual, have not been disappointed. These seats are comfortable, easy to install, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Britt B.

customer_reviews.title: It's coushiony and good quality but boy it's huge!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is beautiful and good duality and very super soft but I couldn't fit it in the back of my car (Lexus nt). I have to admit my SUV is small but any other car seat fit there perfectly. The Maxi Cosi is BIG. Buy it if you have enough space for it though
customer_reviews.author: nooshinlw

customer_reviews.title: " She says it's very comfortable. I had originally ordered the new Britax Marathon ...
customer_reviews.text: Our almost 3yr old preschooler loves her new seat! She climbs on into it and says! "Yay! New seat!" She says it's very comfortable. I had originally ordered the new Britax Marathon click and I knew it wasn't going to work. First it was dirty and scratched, second she was already at the second to last height adjustment. And she was younger than, so we decided on this new maxi-cosi. We love it and her head doesn't go forward AT ALL when she falls asleep in the car, the air pillows on the sides are nice.
customer_reviews.author: jss142

customer_reviews.title: ... car seat seems comfy and strong but i absolutely hate the buckling device
customer_reviews.text: The car seat seems comfy and strong but i absolutely hate the buckling device. It is so difficult to unbuckle baby which is so dangerous incase of emergency. Because of this i would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sheena millet pantin

customer_reviews.title: I own 4 all from Amazon All great
customer_reviews.text: I own 4. All from Amazon. Great company too. I had to call customer service twice and they were so incredibly easy to work with. Will keep buying the 85 series too. I like the buckle "holders" on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom83

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable car seat with few flaws but needs a ratcheting system.
customer_reviews.text: Not many complaints here other than a racheting system would have made the seat much easier to install. The current system (similar to an old school seat belt" is awkward to tighten while trying to push down on the seat to get it really tight. The bucket system is good but the little metal inserts are always running down under my kid before I can get them latched in. Over all I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Waterson

customer_reviews.title: Size is an issue
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is comfortable but a monster in size. Make sure your back seat will accommodate the girth. The rear facing setting does not allow enough room to put thefts t seat back past closest setting to dashboard. Can’t use the front seat unless you are tiny
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Best convertible car seat out there!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so comfortable in this car seat it has been a total game changer for car rides. She does not make a peep anymore! It was easy to install. Love that it is washable. We were going to buy a cheaper car seat for my husbands car but when this went on sale during prime day- it was a no brainer to get a second maxi Cosi!
customer_reviews.author: B.Cox

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best car seat for a small car
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is fantastic! It fits in my Mazda 3, rear facing, without sliding the seat in front of it all the way forward. It's nice and soft, seems to be made from sturdy materials, and fully adjustable without removing from the car. My only regret is not buying this sooner, it would have been great for my older son before he moved on to a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic. I bought it for my grand daughter (my ...
customer_reviews.text: OMgosh! First I couldn't believe a car seat cost this much money. But... It is fantastic. I bought it for my grand daughter (my first), So of course wanted her to always be safe. Received it fast, It was so soft and comfortable. This is perfect! I would highly recommend this to anyone. Yes I would buy another one!!! Easy to install and fit the straps to the right fit.Very durable. The Men at the fire station (my daughter in-law had to make sure it was put in properly ) Said the car seat was extremely impressive! As I said before I would highly recommend this Car Seat! It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat ever!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is all I will ever buy. We started with the Maxi Cosi infant car seat and absolutely loved it. Now its time to upgrade and we wanted to stick with this brand and just couldn't be happier. It is the most comfortable car seat, I literally touched all of them at Buy Buy Baby and this one is the softest. It's a great price too, the more expensive ones don't feel this good. Their skull is so safe and protected in the event of an accident. Our son has always felt comfortable in these seats and can fall asleep easy! It's machine washable too which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Brandt and Jen Barham

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: We are all obsessed with this car seat. I was worried because I saw a ton of reviews saying the straps are hard to tighten - they ARE NOT! My son asks to sit it in all the time because it’s so comfy. We live in Arizona and the summers can be hot in the back seat - in his old car seat he would be drenched in sweat after driving - but this car seat he is not hot at all! I’m so happy with our purchase. I’ll be getting the infant seat for our next one in October!
customer_reviews.author: bcclark

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels luxury
customer_reviews.text: Car seat is really nice and looks nice. However, the back of the seat isn’t too pleasant to look at while rear facing. Also, hard to get the rear facing strap tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley KOSS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Safety for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat with excellent safety reviews. If you are looking for something that you can use with confidence that in the case of an accident, god forbid, your child will be protected the best as possible then this is it. I wouldn't recommend this to seat to individuals that plan to move it from car to car as it is NOT easy to install and remove. Outside of that the car seat is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Tightening strap a challenge for daily use
customer_reviews.text: The design looks nice. Based on all the reviews here and on various blogs I trust the safety is also good. But there's a problem in day to day usage. The tightening strap is very hard to pull once the child is in the seat and pressing down on the strap, especially towards the end of the range. I have to try very hard to pull it sufficiently tight. Compared to the Britax Advocate we also have, this one is definitely harder to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jing J

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, Difficult Install
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is very sturdy and comfortable for my baby! The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars and not 5 stars is because it was an absolute pain in the butt to install in my Jeep!!! Their install set-up needs to be redesigned because it’s a mess. Besides that, I love the seat. Modern looking, love the all black.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the color as I am a Britax person and my husband needed a car seat. Dislike how the clasp closes on itself because the magnetic force pulls them together but other than that he seems to like it and the baby enjoys sitting in it. Not as breathable as my Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and beautiful for my little girl!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is really comfortable! My baby transitioned to this one from the Maxi Cosi infant carseat at 3 months. She is a big baby weighing 20 lbs at 3 months. It cuddles her so well. She loves it. She's our 3rd baby. We have tons of carseats at home, but still decided to buy Maxi Cosi products new for her. They are so beautiful. We got lots of compliments everywhere we go. The air cushion help the baby not to get too hot in the car seat. Our baby survived 100+ degree temperature in this carseat! It is rather large though - we had to buy a combi for our Ford CMAX Energi, because this one won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Annie W.

customer_reviews.title: Washing capability is awesome but ease of use is not
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can wash the covers on this car seat! They don't get washed as often as I'd like though. It's not the most user friendly though. Lower rating due to difficulty in tightening the straps on the child and twisting of straps. It just depends on what you need and want.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Rodway

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter HATED the bucket seat so I bought this when she was two weeks old and now she no longer screams in the car. It was easy to install and it doesn’t take up much space in my small SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Car seat! Kiddos Agree!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my twins because of the great reviews. Quality Brand and Materials. Removable & washable. My kids agree that it’s comfortable so they don’t mind taking longer car rides and we always bring their cups (easy placement). I fit 3 in a single row in an SUV (Santa Fe) with twins on outer seat facing forward and little one rear facing in center.
customer_reviews.author: Joli Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tighten- not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was very bulky and restricted my son’s movement more than is necessary, so he absolutely hated it. You have to pull the straps on the back of the car seat before pulling the strap to tighten it in the front, or it is almost impossible to tighten appropriately. Don’t know how this would work for a forward-facing child. Overall, this car seat was too expensive to not be great, and it was not great.
customer_reviews.author: Casey La Voie

customer_reviews.title: Travel distances with THIS seat!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it- he's a large 6 month old. Easy to install with space in front of the passenger. I drive a Volvo xc90. The fabric is great, the seat is soft and cushy! First thing we did was drive 7 hours to Myrtle Beach and he didn't fuss! Sits securely with the seatbelt install- we couldn't get it in with latch rear facing, but I had read that in advance. Great seat all around- we started with a Britax BSafe
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Woolridge

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable for my daughter. Cover goes on and off easily for washing. I wish the cup holders popped out for cleaning. It's really hard to get tight in the car. I dread moving it from car to car or taking it out for any reason, because it's a pain to reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: julierobinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, safe, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one after my toddler grew out of her infant car seat. We love it. It’s very sturdy and comfortable comparing to others we’ve seen. Even with long road trips. She often fell asleep in it nicely. We ended up buying the exact same one for another car.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy For all Particular Parents
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic seat, my son never minds being in it. Very soft fabric & comfortable padding (so much so that my son fell asleep minutes after I put him in it to see how he liked it). It solidly made so it makes me feel that my son is very safe in it. I have purchased MaxiCosi products many times & I am always happy with their quality & high standard for their products. A must buy for all particular parents!
customer_reviews.author: ZombieBarbieDoll

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAR SEAT
customer_reviews.text: THIS CARSEAT IS A SAFETY HAZARD My 16 month old daughter was able to undo the chest clip. I’ve only had this car seat to 5 months!! Now I have to buy a new one. SAVE YOUR MONEY! DON’T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat on the market!
customer_reviews.text: (I adjusted the straps and chest buckle in picture) This is by far the best car seat you have have a little one in! It’s super soft and easy to install, clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Gina B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: My baby was growing out of the DOONA that we have. My wife and I have been looking for a car seat that is both affordable and in our price range. This was the perfect seat that was easy to install and our baby loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Great but awful to install
customer_reviews.text: Love the safety features of this car Seat but it’s horrendous to install. It’s huge and do not buy if you have a compact car. My son loves it and the cup holder is great. I like the easy open magnetic chest clips. The straps are very secure. I had to have this professionally installed. That’s my only negative
customer_reviews.author: Maxine E.

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this car seat
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this car seat. It looks well made, sturdy and comfortable for the kid. I like that the cover can be washed (very important for all baby products that usually require cleaning) The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because of the straps that are not so easy to adjust and because our baby is still little the straps are short so they don't really reach that strap holder which is advertised as an improved feature for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the best carseat of all time! I was attracted to this one for its safety, but out delivered so much more when I pulled it out of the box. It has clean lines and the solid black makes it very attractive. My daughter really likes how comfortable this one is. we even went on a 12 hour road trip with no complaints! I also like how it can hold up to 85 lbs unlike most out there! It is easy to clean and hides dirt really well! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: the best quality and practical car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and looked hard for. Wish I knew of this brand long ago. It has really great soft durable padding. The shoulder straps/pads are ingenious. They help place the harness bar at the correct nipple line placement. The only negative is it's very difficult to unbuckle with one hand. We have gone through 4 car seats, all top dollar great and safe brands. I rank this #1! To top it all off, it has a cup holder where you can remove the cup for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Emily123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy car seat I do highly recommend this for anyone who wasn’t there children to be safe, comfortable, and over all safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Straps do not work and are too tight/tough to secure.
customer_reviews.text: I have checked the routing of the harness and straps several times and they are not twisted, tangled or snagged on anything. Yet it is nearly impossible to tighten the straps when our son is in the car seat. Now we have to replace this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different carseat if you want to be able to tighten the shoulder straps
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they made the shoulder straps so hard to tighten. Hurt my shoulder trying to tighten the straps and my wife can't even do it at all. Going to have to throw this in the trash and get a new carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped horrible car rides!
customer_reviews.text: My son hates the car. He hated his infant seat, he hated his graco seat so after a long decision i chose to splurge on this seat. he absolutely adores it. He has never ridden with us without hollering he’s 18months i was losing hair and avoiding leaving my home but this seat?! he goes to sleep or plays with a toy and sits their talking to us but NO SCREAMING!! Im pregnant now and will be getting one for my daughter as well. Best seat ever.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and size is very good
customer_reviews.text: it is very well designed and the size is great. however, my son does not like the seatbelt buckle. I think it may be too close to his body and the angle may not be the best for my son.
customer_reviews.author: edk

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat!! It is amazing and so soft! The fabric is my favorite and second maxi cosi! I think the seat is very comfortable for tall kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much Needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter no longer cries, thankfully I transitioned her out of the infant car seat. She doesn’t cry when it time to sit, she actually falls right to sleep. It sits up high enough for her to see out of the window and the cushioning is great. Definitely, worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: My baby girl loves this car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used to cry in her other seat. Now she never does with this one. It’s so soft and comfy looking! I love the cup holder and everything about it. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice we bought twice.
customer_reviews.text: We have two in our GMC Yukon’s back seat. They are very comfortable for my little ones. I wash and dry the covers often and they are holding up really well. Seat belts are easy to adjust on the go. There is plenty of room for a passenger between the seats- it’s just hard to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Painful to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and compact but very difficult to install. It was very hard and nearly impossible to get this carseat installed well. I am still not happy with the amount of movement the carseat has. I had little blood blisters on my hands from pulling so hard on the straps to get it tight enough. I also find it hard to tighten down the harness straps. The harness holders and cup holder are very nice features. Ultimately this carseat moved to the vehicle we rarely travel with baby in and I got a chicco next fit zip and I am much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Little

customer_reviews.title: Love 😍
customer_reviews.text: Such a sleek look for a car seat. The padding is memory foam and seems to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine Moore

product_meta.title: Maxi-Cosi Pria 85 Convertible Car Seat, Devoted Black
product_meta.description: Color:Devoted Black| Style:Pria 85Supreme comfort surround your child in comfort with the Maxi-Cosi Pria 85 2-in-1 convertible car seat. Featuring CosiCushion fabrics and padding, it's the only premium convertible car seat that offers a first-class ride from 14-85 pounds.Side impact protection The Pria 85 fits children as a rear-facing car seat starting at 14 pounds and keeps them cozy up to 40 pounds. When they're ready to ride forward-facing, turn this car seat around to safely fit children up to 85 pounds; The highest weight range offered by a harness in a convertible car seat (as of November 2016). both stages benefit from the air Protect Side Impact technology.Convenient harness holders it's also easier to get your child in and out of the Pria 85 thanks to harness holders that keep the straps out of the way and a flip away car seat buckle. This clever buckle won't get stuck under your baby When getting in the seat or stuck in clothing when getting out.Machine washable fabrics keeping the Pria 85 clean is simple. The seat pad unsnaps and removes easily over the frame, and can go right into the washer and dryer. Also, there's no need to remove the seat from the car or to make complicated maneuvers with the harness straps. All this allows you to get a thorough clean not available in other car seats.More room for passengers Maxi-Cosi Pria 85 2-in-1 convertible car seat is also specially designed to fit better in your car, allowing more room for your passengers to stretch out in the front seats.
feature_bullets: This extra-comfortable, LATCH-equipped Maxi-Cosi car seat offers a first-class ride, rear-facing from 14 to 40 pounds and 22 to 85 pounds forward-facing.
The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and includes one-hand harness height and headrest adjustment for a precise fit.
Your child rides safely with the innovative Fletch system for multi-directional energy Management and the revolutionary air Protect Advanced side-impact protection.
Keep straps out of the way for easy boarding with the handy harness holders, and the flip away buckle won't get in the way while your child gets in and out.
Easy to clean, The seat pad unsnaps and slips off the frame, ready to go into the washing machine and dryer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,056 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
